title: Shawl, 1830s
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: tapestry weave, interlocking twill
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: White ground with close-set finely stylized floral serpentines and small floral sprigs in interspaces; in red, yellow, blue, blue-green, black.  Narrow floral guard border on four sides.  Warp-fringed ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 1830s.
1830s. Medium: wool
Technique: tapestry weave, interlocking twill. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-26.
